title: Green whitening of polyester fabric using fluorescent brightener OB-1 in a mixture of water and decamethylcyclopentasiloxane media
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Yingjie Cai, Jianhua Xiong, Le Li, Md Reazuddin Repon, Md Nahid Pervez, Ai Chen, Xiaohua Zhao, Shuang Han, Xiaorong Xiong, Vincenzo Naddeo, Lina Lin
